column5: Dry shake all but soda water (no ice) for 10 seconds. Then add ice and shake until cold. Strain into glass and top with soda water.
Drop sugar cube into the flute and douse with the bitters. Then pour in champagne and enjoy.
Drop sugar cube in the flute and douse with the bitters. Add the Lillet and then add the champagne and stir lightly.
Lightly muddle mint leaves in shaker. Add everything except club soda and shake until cold. Strain in glass and top with club soda and mint sprig.
Dry shake all except bitters (no ice) for 10 seconds. Then add ice and shake until cold. Strain into glass and top with bitters.
Dry shake all but soda water (no ice) for 60 seconds. Then add ice and shake until cold. Strain into glass and top with soda water.

Add the absinthe to the glass and roll it around then discard the extra. Stir the other liquid ingredients with ice until cold then strain into glass. Rub the lemon peel around the rim of the glass then rest on it on the rim.

Make syrup by combining rye and sugar 1:1 then heating until combined. Simmer blood orange juice until reduced by a third or so then let cool. Stir all ingredients with ice until cold and then strain into an old-fashioned glass with one large ice cube.
Combine ingredients in mixing glass and stir with ice until cold
Stir with no ice until sugar dissolves. Then add ice and stir until chilled. Strain into glass. Squeeze the oil from the lemon peel over the glass and discard.
Combine ingredients in mixing glass and stir with ice until cold
